Context:
* Academic departments can be contacted for grades and graduation requirements at 416 415-2000 or by visiting the George Brown College website.
* The Office of the Registrar is responsible for convocation ceremonies. Their mailing address is P.O. Box 1015Station B, Toronto, M5T 2T9 and their fax number is 416 415-4289. Their general email address is convocation@georgebrown.ca.
* Students can sign up to receive information about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more.
* The contact centre number for George Brown College is 416 415-2000. TTY number is 1-877-515-5559. Students can also contact [ask.george@georgebrown.ca](mailto:ask.george@georgebrown.ca).
* The website contains information that is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
